main.util

Class Util

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.util.Util

  • public class Util
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides a set fo utility methods widely used in the project
    Author:
    Martini Davide Distributed Systems class (AY 2017/2018), University of Padua, Master's degree in Computer Engineering.

      • belongsToOpenInterval

        public static boolean belongsToOpenInterval(java.math.BigInteger id,
                                            java.math.BigInteger from,
                                            java.math.BigInteger to)
        This method is called to compute if a file or internal node has id that belongs to the interval (from, to)
        Parameters:
        id - It is the id of a file or a node
        from - The beginning of the interval
        to - The end of the interval
        Returns:
        True if id belongs to the interval (from, to), false otherwise
